mapper.select: SELECT match_num , DATE_TRUNC('hour', match_date::timestamp) as match_date , case when match_cpl_ysno = 'Y' then '매칭 완료' else '매칭 가능' end as match_cpl_ysno , case when start_ysno = 'Y' then '진행중' else '대기중' end as start_ysno , stadium_num FROM mtc.match_master WHERE 1=1 AND dlt_ysno = 'N' limit 10 ;
